1.content:
You had a good feeling about today. You had an apartment in the middle of the downtown centre, so you walked around looking for attractive women who looked like they would be down for some kinky fun. There were just so many of them. Maybe it would narrow down your choices if you decided what activity you wanted them to do first.

-Sex Toys

-Bondage

-Sexy Costume

-Hypnosis

-Something Else
1.title: Welcome to Showbiz

11.content:
You decided to find someone willing to use some kind of sex toy in public. Just as you decided that, you spotted a prime candidate. It was a gorgeous brunette woman with an excellent figure. She was wearing sunglasses, a red and white sundress, and red high heeled sandals. You made a beeline towards her.

"Excuse me, miss. How would you like to earn $300 right here, right now." you said

"Uh, what would I have to do?" she asked

You held open a shopping bag.

"This bag is full of sex toys. All you have to do is put one of them on and just keep walking around for 15 mins while we film you." you explained

What does she decide?
11.title: Sex Toys

choices: Afterwards, you say goodbye and find someone new
Afterwards, you try to talk her into doing something else
115.content:
"Would you give me more money if I was willing to wear more than one?" she asked

You may have been surprised, but you were prepared for this.

"Sure. I'll give you $300 for the first toy, and an extra $50 for each additional toy." you said

"Alright. Let's do this." she said

"Which ones do you want?" you asked

"Give me all of them." she said

You smiled, and had her lift the hem of her dress.

You pulled down her panties and slipped in the vibrator and plug. Then you slid the panties back up and secured the chastity belt with a locking click. Next you had her release the hem of her dress, and put a bright red ball gag in her mouth. You fastened the strap at the nape of her neck, where her hair concealed it. Then you slipped the $450 into her bra, turned on the vibrator, and slapped her on the ass to get her walking.
115.title: Unexpected Answer

choices: Tie them together in a centaur shape

You decided to find someone willing to have some kinky bondage fun. Just as you decided that, you spotted a couple of hot blondes walking down the street. One was tall, wearing a plaid tied off t-shirt, jean shorts and 3" wedge sandals. The other was shorter, wearing a yellow dress and flip-flops.

They were both wearing sports bras, tna pants and running shoes with their hair in ponytails. The only difference was that the older brunette's bra was blue, while the younger's was hot pink.

14.content:
You decided to find some subjects to hypnotize. Looking around, you spotted a pair of gorgeous redheads. One was wearing a t-shirt, jeans and sneakers with her hair down and very little makeup, while the other wore black 4" pumps, pantyhose, a knee-length pencil skirt, a white blouse, and a black blazer with her hair in a bun and classy but noticeable makeup. You observed them as they walked towards you. From a distance of 10 feet away, you realized that they were twins! You immediately approached them.

"Excuse me ladies, but how would you like to earn $350 each?"

The twin redheads exchanged a look.

"I could use the money." said the casual one

"What would we have to do?" asked the professional one

"I will attempt to hypnotize you, and then film your hypnotized selves." you said

"What if you can't hypnotize us?" asked the casual one

"Then you'll have earned $350 after just listening to me talk in monotone for a couple minutes." you said

"Okay, let's do this." said the casual one

The professional one nodded in agreement. You pulled out a clear crystal pendant on a long chain. You started to sway it back and forth.

"Stare into the crystal. Stare deep into the void it contains. If you stare deep enough, you will begin to see a small light glowing from within. Do you see it?"

They nodded; their eyes still locked onto the crystal.

"That light is the embodiment of your inner strength. The deeper you look into it, the brighter it glows. The brighter it glows, the more suggestible you will feel. This crystal collects your inner strength, leaving you vulnerable to suggestion. Once the pendant stops swinging, the crystal will contain all of your inner strength and willpower, leaving you completely vulnerable to my suggestions."

You slowly allowed the pendant to stop swinging.

"You will remain in this state until I say the word "Unitas", which will free your inner strength from the crystal and return it to you. However, any suggestions I have implanted in you will remain even with your inner strength. They will be a part of you."

You put the crystal away, but the twins remained entranced. What do you do with them?
14.title: Hypnosis

choices: Convince them to do something else
141.content:
"Now tell me, what are your names?" you inquired

"My name is Rachel." said the casual one

"My name is Carrie." said the professional one

"As sisters, you know each other well. Even more-so for twins. For the rest of today, you will assume the identity of your twin. You will notice upon awakening that your sister is wearing your clothes, your style of makeup, and your hairstyle. You will feel eager to swap your outfits and re-do your makeup and hair, and won't mind us filming the process. Now, Unitas."

With a jolt, the twins were free to move once again. They looked at each other and shared a mortified look.

"Carrie, what are you doing wearing my clothes?" asked the real Carrie

"You're wearing my clothes too." said Rachel

"If you want, you can change back at our apartment." you interjected

"Thank you." they replied

You lead them back, and watch them strip naked, trade clothes, and get re-dressed before re-doing their hair and makeup.

What now?
141.title: Have them trade identities for the rest of the day

142.content:
"You will find yourselves feeling that as twins, it is your duty to look exactly alike. You will be unable to tolerate not wearing the same makeup, the same outfit, or not having the same hair style. You will feel the need to correct any such mistakes as soon as possible. Now, Unitas."

The twins began moving again. They looked at each other, then at themselves, then they shared a mortified look. Ignoring the fact that they were in public, they quickly set to stripping out of their clothes, until all they wore were matching sets of black bra and panties. Next, the casual one took the makeup out of the professional twin's purse and quickly dolled herself up to look the same. Meanwhile her twin let her hair down, and sorted it out so it matched the casual twin.

Now that their compulsion was satisfied, they realized how exposed they were.

"We need to find some matching outfits, fast." they said in unison

"I might be able to help you out." you said, and the twins followed you back to your apartment, which you kept ready for staging private activities
142.title: Make them compelled to only dress the same

155222.content:
You happen upon a group of four cute girls that look to be in their early to mid 20's, chatting amicably with each other. They aren't in costume themselves, but you can see them 'admiring' the cosplayers that pass by them. Containing your excitement professionally, you approach them.

"Hello, Ladies. How are you enjoying the con?" you asked them

"It's a lot of fun. We've been walking around non-stop." replied one of the girls

"Are you taking the day off from cosplaying?" you asked

"No, we don't have costumes." said one of the girls

"We'd love to cosplay, but none of us have the sewing skills to make costumes, or the money to buy decent ones from the shops." said another

"What if I said I would pay you girls to wear costumes that I supplied?" you offered

"Where are these costumes?"

"Yeah and how do we know its not a ruse to kidnap us?"

"All fair questions. The costumes are all in my truck, and I wouldn't expect you to follow me there, so I have an archive of all the costumes on this tablet." you handed them the tablet "Pass it around, and if there are costumes you want to wear, pick them out, I'll have them brought down here, and you can change into them in the venue's washrooms. Sound fair?"

The girls who had been skeptical couldn't find anything wrong with the plan. It seemed to be planned out well so that they wouldn't feel uncomfortable. One of the other girls who seemed rather eager snatched the tablet and began scrolling.

"Fuck yeah, let's do it!" she cried

One of the other girls facepalmed at the eager girls antics, but nonetheless they all huddled around the tablet and started discussing choices.
155222.title: Aspiring to Cosplay

info.brief_description: You are a reporter tasked with revealing the kinky side of the general public
info.description:
You are a reporter for a small pornographic reality TV bit called 'Sex Sells'. You go out on the streets with your camera(wo)man, looking for the next daily stars for your show. Your directive is to offer beautiful young women money to do kinky and sexually devious activities while you record it.

You have access to a variety of resources and materials, in addition to a series of skills. You are highly proficient at applying complex stage makeup to a subject, tying intricate knots, and hypnosis

Rules:
-Don't be gross
-All girls must be at least 18 years old
-Everything must be recorded
-Nothing criminal
-Hypnosis only works on willing candidates
